item.title: A short Story of COVID-19 in South Africa
item.description:
Getting the Data

## # A tibble: 192 x 14
##    date  YYYYMMDD eastern_cape free_state gauteng kwazulu_natal limpopo
##    <chr>    <dbl>        <dbl>      <dbl>   <dbl>         <dbl>   <dbl>
##  1 05-0… 20200305            0          0       0             1       0
##  2 07-0… 20200307            0          0       1             1       0
##  3 08-0… 20200308            0          0       1             2       0
##  4 09-0… 20200309            0          0       1             6       0
##  5 11-0… 20200311            0          0       5             7       0
##  6 12-0… 20200312            0          0       6             8       0
##  7 13-0… 20200313            0          0      10            10       0
##  8 14-0… 20200314            0          0      17            11       0
##  9 15-0… 20200315            0          0      24            12       0
## 10 16-0… 20200316            0          0      31            12       1
## # … with 182 more rows, and 7 more variables: mpumalanga <dbl>,
## #   northern_cape <dbl>, north_west <dbl>, wester_cape <dbl>, UNKNOWN <dbl>,
## #   total <dbl>, source <chr>

Introduction

## # A tibble: 10 x 2
##    country      confirmed_cases
##    <chr>                  <int>
##  1 Argentina             417735
##  2 Brazil               3908272
##  3 Colombia              615094
##  4 India                3691166
##  5 Mexico                599560
##  6 Peru                  647166
##  7 Russia                992402
##  8 South Africa          627041
##  9 Spain                 462858
## 10 US                   6030587
  • As of today, South Africa remains top 10 country with most confirmed cases
  • How many third world country are there in this list?

COVID-19 Cases in Singapore
